objective: Detect Romanian companies and projects seeking AI, automation, or fractional CTO support.

metadata.notes: Groq scrapes Romanian sources; Gemini evaluates feasibility and prepares outreach notes.

workflow: Crawl Romanian job boards (eJobs, BestJobs, Hipo.ro) for AI/data automation roles allowing contractor engagement.
Scan startup hubs (ROStartup, TechAngels, Spherik, InnovX) and incubator postings for technical leadership needs.
Identify EU-funded Romanian projects seeking digital transformation partners.
List local SMEs undergoing digitalisation that could adopt AI automation pilots with remote delivery.
Compile minimum 10 prospects including contact, project scope, language requirements, estimated budget, and payment terms confidence.
